title: Teemo Shroom Bug
body:
If a ward expires beside a teemo shroom, the shroom is destroyed. This works for both ally and enemy wards. The ward takes ticks of damage but it is invulnerable.

Pls fix rito               {{champion:17}} {{item:3340}}

replies.body: Good, Satan deserves to be bugged beyond use...
Pretty mad bug.. Could be a cool in game mechanic if they decide to buff teemo yet add this in
Do you have footage? Riot's not going to do anything if you don't. Also you should be reporting the bug [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
